ygData.subject: Re: Hello, Question for ya.
ygData.msgSnippet: for locations of where you can buy things, go to http://members.aol.com/niamist/. For information on smithing costs, items, and trivial points, go to
ygData.messageBody:
for locations of where you can buy things, go to
http://members.aol.com/niamist/. For information on smithing costs, items, and
trivial points, go to http://tradecouncil.eqrealms.com/trade/. Actually, the
first site is in the links section of the second site :) I only put worthy links
on my page.

-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM
